recommended_degree: Teknologi Telekomunikasi, Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak Aplikasi, Sistem informasi, Teknologi Rekayasa Multimedia (Sarjana)
job_title: Assist HPIO in Datacenter & Operation Network Support
job_description:
IT Technician
•  Assist HPIO to check Passenger Service/IT Equipment at the station 
•  Record the condition of Passenger Service devices 
•  Perform network device checks 
•  Perform device checks at the Data Center 
•  Perform network device analysis 
•  Escalate and report any problems encountered 
•  Manage incident tickets using ITSM tools (JIRA, ServiceNow, etc.) 
•  Action assigned tickets on Ticketing system. 
•  Update tickets daily. 
•  Give timely feedback. 
•  Ensure that tickets are closed timeously with high quality service ensuring minimal comebacks
position_type: Assist HPIO in Datacenter & Operation Network Support
